ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: This work was supported by the National Natural Science Foundation of China (Nos. 81822027 and 81630090), the National Key R&D Program of China (No. 2019YFA0904400), the National Science and Technology Major Projects of Infectious Disease funds (No. 2018ZX10301403), and the grant from the Chinese Academy of Medical Sciences (No. 2019PT350002).
